text: Tara sudhu era'i to pratiksa kare ye, tadera kache phirisata asabe, kimba apanara raba asabena, kimba apanara rabera kono nidarsana asabe [1]? Yedina apanara rabera kona nidarsana asabe sedina tara imana kono kaje asabe na, ye purbe imana aneni [2] athaba ye byakti imanera madhyame kalyana labha kareni [3].
